title: ZHOR Modules
description: ZHOR_Modules is a multi-purpose collection of modules for Python to make programming easier. We often use the same programming patterns, so instead of repeating and re-writing the same things over and over, we've figured that we might aswell just wrap 'em all toghether in a nice bundle. ZHOR_Modules is the foundation of almost all the projects we work on. So if we publish something out, chances are you will be required to install this repo first.

title: IFCIT
description: IFCIT stands for Input Form Command Injection Tester. Man that's a mouthful. As the name suggests, IFCIT is a tool used to scan and evaluate command injection vulnerabilities on websites. It is currently a private repository, as it is still under construction.
